column1: 10/10 - Great job identifying the production function as a suitable candidate for implementing scrum/sprint methodologies and providing a clear explanation of how it could operate in this context. Keep up the good work!
10 pts - Some vagueness in description, but largely OK. Good effort in explaining scrum/sprint and kanban for different functions, but could be more specific in certain areas. Keep up the good work!

7 pts for Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit

Good effort in discussing the benefits of scrum/sprint and kanban for different functions, but the explanation of why kanban is a poor fit for the chosen function could be clearer and more specific. Keep up the good work!

10/10 - Great job identifying the distribution function as the one that could benefit the most from implementing Kanban methodology. Your explanation of the possible columns in the Kanban board is clear and well-organized. Keep up the good work!
12 pts - Very complete and clear description of how kanban could operate. Great job on providing specific details and examples for the Mighty Jaxx business function. Keep up the good work!

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit.

Comment: Good attempt at explaining the benefits of scrum/sprint and kanban for different functions, but the discussion on why scrum/sprint is a poor fit for the chosen function could be more specific and clear. Keep up the good work!

4 pts - Not really clear that this bias is relevant to the situation

Comment: Good attempt at explaining the Availability Heuristic, but it's not clearly relevant to the decision about implementing Agile in Mighty Jaxx.

6 pts - Noticeable errors or misunderstanding in the definition

Comment: You provided a definition of Availability Heuristic, but it was not very clear and concise. Make sure to focus on explaining the bias in a more straightforward manner. Keep practicing!
12 pts - Complete and clear description of possible problem. Great job in providing detailed explanations and addressing the cognitive bias. Keep up the good work!

10 pts - Complete and clear description of possible step or action.

Great job! You provided clear and detailed descriptions of the steps and actions for implementing Agile methodologies in Mighty Jaxx. Keep up the good work!
